ch.iserver.ace.collaboration
Interface Participant

All Known Implementing Classes:
ParticipantImpl
public interface Participant

A Participant is a contributor to an editing session. He has a session wide unique id identifying him.

Field Summary
static int DISCONNECTED
          Constant used in notifications when a connection to a participant fails.
static int DOCUMENT_MODIFICATION_FAILED
          Constant used in notifications when receiving things from a participant fails.

          Constant used in notifications when a participant leaves a Session.

          Constant used in notifications when a participant leaves a Session.
static int RECEPTION_FAILED
          Constant used in notifications when receiving things from a participant fails.
 
Method Summary
 int getParticipantId()
          Retrieves the participant id of this participant in a session.
 RemoteUser getUser()
          Gets the remote user corresponding to this participant.
 

Field Detail

LEFT

static final int LEFT
Constant used in notifications when a participant leaves a Session. Signifies a participant that left the Session voluntarily.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

KICKED

static final int KICKED
Constant used in notifications when a participant leaves a Session. Signifies a participant that was kicked from the Session.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DISCONNECTED

static final int DISCONNECTED
Constant used in notifications when a connection to a participant fails. The participant is then no longer considered part of the session.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RECEPTION_FAILED

static final int RECEPTION_FAILED
Constant used in notifications when receiving things from a participant fails. The participant is then no longer considered part of the session.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

DOCUMENT_MODIFICATION_FAILED

static final int DOCUMENT_MODIFICATION_FAILED
Constant used in notifications when receiving things from a participant fails. The participant is then no longer considered part of the session.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getUser

RemoteUser getUser()
Gets the remote user corresponding to this participant.

Returns:
the remote user corresponding to this participant

getParticipantId

int getParticipantId()
Retrieves the participant id of this participant in a session. Note, a user has (most likely) a different participant id in each session he/she joins. The participant id is a session-wide unique id.

Returns:
the participant id of this participant
